Wizard "我是拉斯莫迪斯……奥术的追寻者。#$b#联系现实和超自然的媒介。#$b#七种元素的主人。#$b#守护圣——……你应该已经明白了。"/pause 1000/move Wizard 0 1 2/speak Wizard "而你@我早就预见了你的到来。"/pause 1500/speak Wizard "来，我要给你看样东西。"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 1/playMusic none/pause 800/speak Wizard "看哪！"/playMusic clubloop/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 19/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/warp Junimo 10 17/specificTemporarySprite junimoCage/pause 1000/playSound dwop/faceDirection Wizard 2 true/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/warp Junimo -3000 -3000/specificTemporarySprite junimoCageGone/playMusic WizardSong/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 500/speak Wizard "我不清楚为什么他们要搬进社区活动中心，但是你没理由害怕他们。"/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -1 0/emote farmer 48/pause 1000/speak Wizard "嗯？你找到了一个写着未知语言的金色卷轴？#$b#真有意思……"/move Wizard 0 1 true/showFrame farmer 94/startJittering/move Wizard 0 -1 0/stopJittering/showFrame farmer 0/move Wizard 0 -2 0/speak Wizard "我找到了笔记……"/move Wizard -2 0 3/pause 800/speak Wizard "这种语言很难懂，但是我能破解它："/pause 1000/message "我们，祝尼魔，很高兴能帮助你。作为回报，我们想要谷中的礼物。如果你是能和森林融为一体的人，那你就能看到卷轴真实的样子。"/pause 500/move Wizard 0 -2 3/faceDirection farmer 3 true/move Wizard -3 0 2/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 18/emote Wizard 40/speak Wizard "唔……“和森林融为一体的人”……这是什么意思？"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "……*嗅嗅*……*嗅嗅*……"/pause 1500/showFrame Wizard 0/jump Wizard/pause 800/speak Wizard "啊哈！$h"/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 1/speak Wizard "过来！$h"/pause 500/move farmer -2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 3/move farmer -2 0 3/move Wizard -1 0 2/move farmer -1 0 2/pause 500/speak Wizard "我的大锅里滚着各种森林里的素材。$h#$b#蕨草，苔藓幼虫，焦糖顶毒蘑菇……你闻到了吗？$h"/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 18/showFrame 96/pause 1000/speak Wizard "给。喝下去。让森林的精髓渗入你的身体。$h"/pause 800/emote farmer 28/showFrame Wizard 19/pause .008/specificTemporarySprite junimoCageGone2/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic none/pause 2000/playSound reward/pause 300/message "你得到了森林的魔力！现在你能读懂祝尼魔卷轴的真正含义了。"/end warpOut
content.418172/n hasPickedUpMagicInk: WizardSong/2 14/farmer 3 14 3 Wizard 1 14 1/skippable/pause 1000/speak Wizard "你找到了墨水！太好了"/move Wizard 1 0 1/pause 1000/speak Wizard "呃……"/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 500/speak Wizard "你有……看到我的前妻吗？#$b#没有？好吧，那她的家呢……？#$b#你觉得她是一个人住吗？还是……$h"/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 0/emote Wizard 12/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 500/speak Wizard "……哎，还是别告诉我了……我不想知道。"/pause 500/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/speak Wizard "……好吧……你一定很好奇你的奖赏。在这……"/move Wizard -1 0 1/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 800/specificTemporarySprite arcaneBook/playSound fireball/shake Wizard 500/pause 4000/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Wizard 1/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 500/speak Wizard "这是本召唤之书。#$b#神秘的潜力是无限的……我来帮你简单化一下吧。#$b#使用这本书后，你能直接召唤魔法建筑物到你的农场里。#$b#我想你会觉得这个有用的。"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Wizard 1/speak Wizard "哦，我差点忘了说了……啊哼……谢谢你。"/pause 1000/emote farmer 32/pause 800/end
